com.assignment2.dos.smarterHomes

Class Devices

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.assignment2.dos.smarterHomes.Devices
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LightBulb, Outlet

    public class Devices
extends java.lang.Object
    Devices class contains the device id and the device name as parameters along with the status of the device. Devices class is the super class for all the devices and contains the basic functionality which is inherited by each device. Currently the LightBulb and the Outlet inherit from it
